overview_of_class: Today, the New Testament is widely known and accepted as Christians' authoritative and sacred collection of texts. But roughly 2,000 years ago, there were no Christians, and there was no New Testament?there was only a small group of people who had begun to worship a deceased Jewish healer and teacher as divine. It is this historical moment to which we turn in this course. We will study the people, events, and texts of the first and second centuries that shaped this small Jewish movement into the religion known as Christianity, using as our main evidence the letters and stories of the New Testament.
name: Introduction to the New Testament
subject: RELIGION
